about_the_game:
A Famitsu collaboration! The Powerful Item Set includes 3x items (set of 3) that'll help ease any pain in your travels throughout Varneria.

The Powerful Item Set includes:

・Holy Water of Recovery F x3
・Holy Water of Revival F x3
・Holy Water of Miracles F x3
detailed_description:
A Famitsu collaboration! The Powerful Item Set includes 3x items (set of 3) that'll help ease any pain in your travels throughout Varneria.

The Powerful Item Set includes:

・Holy Water of Recovery F x3
・Holy Water of Revival F x3
・Holy Water of Miracles F x3
legal_notice: ©2019 IDEA FACTORY / COMPILE HEART All rights reserved. Dragon Star Varnir is a trademark of IDEA FACTORY. Licensed to and published by Idea Factory International, Inc.
name: Dragon Star Varnir Powerful Item Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: The Powerful Item Set includes 3x items (set of 3) for your travels throughout Varneria!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
